.b-chart-type-thumbnail[data-id=pie].title: Pre-defined chart types
.b-chart-type-thumbnail[data-id=pie].content: Choose from among the most useful common chart types out of the box. Charts are rendered using the third-party Chart.js library (MIT license).

.b-chart-appearance-tab.title: Customize the chart
.b-chart-appearance-tab.content: Explore other designer tabs to fully customize the chart's appearance

.b-grid-cell.title: Create more charts
.b-grid-cell.content: Right-click a grid cell and select New Chart to create a chart from the selected cells
